net.xuset.objectIO.connections.sockets

Interface InetCon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Connection, MsgParsable, StreamConI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupClientCon, GroupServerCon, TcpCon, TcpHandshakeCon

    public interface InetCon
extends StreamConI
    Interface that is useful for internet connections.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.xuset.objectIO.connections.Connection

        BROADCAST_CONNECTION

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalId

        long getLocalId()
        The local id should be the same for all connections on one machine. This is not required and is left up to the implementation.
        Returns:
        the local id of the connection.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Indicates if the connection is still alive.
        Returns:
        true if the connection is still connected

      • watchEvents

        boolean watchEvents(InetEventListener e)
        The event listener will be notified when an event happens.
        Parameters:
        e - the event listener to add
        Returns:
        true if successfully added

      • unwatchEvents

        boolean unwatchEvents(InetEventListener e)
        The event listener will no longer be notified
        Parameters:
        e - event listener to remove
        Returns:
        true if the event listener was found and removed successfully

      • isBroadcast

        boolean isBroadcast()
        Indicates if this connection is broadcast connection. What the connection does and how it broadcasts is left up to the implementation.
        Returns:
        true if the connection broadcasts

      • isLoopback

        boolean isLoopback()
        Indicates if this connection is a loop back connection. In a loop back connection sent messages will be redirected to it's received messages.
        Returns:
        true if the connection loops back
